Words by:

Loic Juillard

Loic has over 20 years of industry experience in the Cloud services and AI industry. At Sama he works as the VP of Research & Development. His experience includes Fortune 500 Companies such as Salesforce.com, Unity Technologies, and AT&T where he led the development of large scale AI, data analytics, and cloud solutions. Loic received his MS in computer science from UTBM, France.
